title: Emerald Kundan Pearl Statement Haaram - Pachala Haram
materials: Emerald Cabochons. Showcases exquisite Hyderabadi Polish.
features: This stunning Haaram features a floral design, meticulously handcrafted with Kundan setting that enhances the brilliance of each diamond. Intricate filigree work and pearl droplet accents add a touch of elegance. The centerpiece features a central Emerald cabochon, complemented by a larger teardrop pendant also set with emerald. Classic layered design evoking royal Telugu heritage.
occasions: Ideal for grand occasions such as Telugu weddings
or any event where you desire to make a statement. Perfect for brides seeking a traditional yet modern look.
description: This Emerald Kundan Haaram is a testament to timeless elegance and exceptional craftsmanship. The combination of sparkling diamonds, lustrous pearls, and vibrant emeralds creates a captivating piece that embodies grace and sophistication. A valuable heirloom piece, handcrafted in Hyderabad, the city of pearls, ensuring the highest quality and lasting beauty. A symbol of prosperity and good fortune, making it an auspicious choice for brides.
